item.title: Weston Roundtable Lecture Series: Speaker Benjamin Davidson
item.description:
Ben presented the Weston Roundtable lecture on October 24, 2024.

Weston Roundtable Lecture Series Video Archive

item.title: Madison East High School Outreach Project
item.description: Ben organized an day of science outreach for local high school students focused around a mathematical modeling live coding activity. Read more about this outreach event here.

item.title: Transatlantic Research Partnership - Casimir Study
item.description: Ben spent a month collaborating with researchers at IRPHE in Marseille, France to set up preliminary experiemnts to study the Casimir effect on buoyant marine debris in surface wave turbulence.

item.title: Research in the news
item.description: Greg Seitz of Boreal Community Media wrote a story about our 2022 publication regarding microplasitc pollution on the beaches of Lake Superior.

item.title: Young Coastal Scientist and Engineers Conference - Americas (YCSEC-A)
item.description: The University of Wisconsin - Madison hosted the 9th Young Coastal Scientists and Engineers Conference â€“ Americas (YCSEC-A). Ben served on the student organization committee, helping to faciliate a smooth conference experience for the attendees.

item.title: Wisconsin Sea Grant 'Ask a Scientist'
item.description: Ben presented a virtual lesson to high school students at Rhinelander High School about microplastics in the Great Lakes.

item.title: UW - Madison Day at the Capitol
item.description: Ben presented work regarding microplastic pollution and issues to legislators and staff at the Wisconsin state capitol.
